synopsis.text: Yangyao, a celebrated exorcist, utilizes his unique painting abilities to expel spirits that disrupt the tranquility of human lives. Although he's typically adept at handling cases solo, he occasionally seeks the aid of his trusted friend, Yan'an, a skilled winemaker. When Yangyao discerns an unusual occurrence in his hometown, he leverages his expertise to unveil the truth hidden beneath the surface, promising an intriguing journey filled with suspense and supernatural encounters.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
